DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the postoperative insulin resistance and cytokine release would be attenuated in laparoscopic compared with open liver resection.
DOC.brief_title: Surgical Stress After Laparoscopic Compared to Open Liver Resection
DOC.criteria: ASA 12 left hemihepatectomy(liver resection) left lateral sectionectomy(liver resection) Patients with diabetes mellitus drug abuse BMI >24 or <18
